title: Comet 67P
description: The Philae lander of the European Space Agency's Rosetta mission is safely on the surface of Comet 67P/Churyumov-Gerasimenko, as these first two images from the lander's CIVA camera confirm. One of the lander's three feet can be seen in the foreground. The view is a two-image mosaic taken on Nov. 12, 2014.
theme:
LIFELESS. Desert lands — if you value still
and silent beauty of the cosmos
